house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1976 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 1803 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
